title: Net profits/loss of Italian company Dolce & Gabbana in 2014 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Net profits/loss in million euros. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
In general Net profits/loss in million euros has rose over the Year.
Net profits/loss in million euros is roughly constant from 2014 to 2016, gradually increasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Net profits/loss in million euros, of value 27.55 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Net profits/loss in million euros about 3.73 was reached at Year 2016
